channel.title: ADHD Medications: FAERS Safety Updates
channel.description: Focused FAERS adverse event monitoring for ADHD medications: Vyvanse, Concerta, Strattera, Ritalin

item.title: ADHD Safety Alert: VYVANSE (P) FAERS Profile

MetricValueContext

Clinical Context: This data should be interpreted alongside prescribing volume, patient population, and reporting patterns.
